Class MountInfo

java.lang.Object
  MountInfo

public class MountInfo
extends Object

Finds local mount points and gives usage information.

Field Summary
 long available
          The number of bytes available on the filesystem (size - used)
 int capacityPercent
          Percent used disk space (100 * used / size)
 File path
          The path to the mount point
 long size
          The total size of the filesystem in bytes (used + available)
 long used
          The number of bytes currently used on the filesystem (size - available)

Method Detail

mount

public static MountInfo mount(File path)
                       throws IOException
Given a path, returns the mount point.

Parameters:
path - The path to query. Must be a path to a local filesystem. If it is a path to a networked filesystem, it may return null, or a local filesystem.
Returns:
The mount point info for that path
Throws:
IOException - if there is an io error

mounts

public static ArrayList<MountInfo> mounts()
                                   throws IOException
Gets all the known local mount points. Calls df -k, and looks for filesystems on devices from /dev.

Returns:
The list of mount points and their space information
Throws:
IOException - If there is a problem getting the mount points

main

public static void main(String... args)
Test. Gets the mount points and displays the path, capacity, used and size.

Parameters:
args - The paths to files to determine what mount point they are on.
